column3: “belladonna was a great bud.  only smoked it once but i remember when picking it up, the nugs were beautiful with a nice smell.  the smoke was very smooth, when i smoke i usually have a few coughing fits but i did not cough one time with this very light and tasty smoke.  the smoke wasn't tast as in being sweet, but it had a smooth, herbal taste to it.  the high was great.  it wasn't the most potent bud ive smoked, it ...”

“Very nice head and body high for the recreational marijuana smoker. Doesn't work too well for taking pain away but it will lift your mood and make you feel euphoric. Similar effects to that if PineApple Express but the taste is much more earthy. I had this one with THC levels of 26% and kept me high for at least 4 hours.”
“mellow hypnotic effect. The taste is like slight teriyaki mushroom with liquorice while still maintaining an earthyness.”

“Airy buds, really frosty. Thick orange hairs. VERY stinky. Cheese, earth, some fruitiness. I vaped flower- cheese again on inhale and mustiness and strong earth on exhale. Hits fairly quickly but takes about an hour to level off. My head felt pressurized but not in a bad way. I suffer from bad headaches because of pinched nerves, scoliosis, and herniated discs and while this didn't do a ton for straight pain, it help...”
“chill high. was sociable. forgot alot. kind of coffee-ish aftertaste, but i would definitely drink coffee and smoke this”
“Amazing. great comedown and a really great high”

“i have grown a lot of strains ( white russian , blue dream , critical 2.0, etc) but this strain had a completely different high than everything else 
its not the super high thc   strain 
BUT
it ll definitely hit you
It will create a feeling you will never experience from any other strain 
easy to grow 
lovly harvest 

A must try to everyone !!!!!!!!”

“Belladonna my dear!
You were so good last night, a beautiful combination of body relaxation and nice, consistent mind stimulation makes you perfect to enjoy any time of day. Your earthy buttery smell and outstanding orange hairs could make even the worst cotton mouth drool.

9/10 Would recommend to a bud.”
“Good.  Very clear high. Euphoric feeling. Very visual high. Light buds”
“Helps with stress and sleep, great for when your relaxing or going to sleep.”

“Eh it wasnt the best in the world. I like their spoetnik #1 alot better than this: belladonna just didn't do it medicinally for me. The high was pretty trippy, but really not the most pleasurable effects. It brings with it a kind of prime evil bio sludge feel to the high and it does somewhat effect visual observations but its really a creepy type of high in my opinion and not very sativa leaning at all. I'd say the e...”

“Great strain! Really tasty bud, smells and tastes alot like peach!!! High yeilder, dense buds, and nice formation of the plant. For me it has more indica effects, not sativa as mentioned. Really strong body high, heavy couchlock effect. Overall great strain!”
“really enjoying it!! looks beautiful smells good. got me feel in smart and creative :)”

“Belladonna my dear!
You were so good last night, a beautiful combination of body relaxation and nice, consistent mind stimulation makes you perfect to enjoy any time of day. Your earthy buttery smell and outstanding orange hairs could make even the worst cotton mouth drool.

9/10 Would recommend to a bud.”

its not the super high thc   strain

It will create a feeling you will never experience from any other strain

“Pretty nice gentle strain; easy onset with a strong slow high; unusual flavour- smells like the cross it is, but the taste is very much its own.”
